website_summaries.verdict: A highly functional portable closet that holds an impressive amount of clothing while offering plenty of storage room for extras.
pros: With 2 rods and a total of 9 shelves, this option works just as well as an everyday closet as it does for storing out-of-season clothes
Base has room for shoes and the top shelf is ideal for linens
Owners praise its sturdiness and high weight capacity
Extremely well priced, given the quality and size
cons: Plastic connectors can crack with rough handling, but it comes with a couple of extras just in case

customer_reviews.title: Extremely efficient
customer_reviews.text: This closet has been a life saver! I moved into a house where the closet rod kept falling out of the wall and no screws would hold it in. I decided to buy this thing because it has 2 rods. This thing holds ALL of my clothes and still has room. There is a ton of storage in this thing and it is also very sturdy. I set it up my myself and it only took me about an hour. I don't even have to use another dresser because this fits so many clothes and takes up very little space. If you found this review helpful, please click yes :)
customer_reviews.author: Ashley BouchardTop Contributor: Eye Makeup

customer_reviews.title: Such a good product!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I never write review but this product is so great that I must write one. The instruction is easy to understand so it only took me 30 mins to finish it. It's great if you have a small room and need to save space.
customer_reviews.author: Chau Chu

customer_reviews.title: GREAT!!
customer_reviews.text: Read some reviews before I purchased, and I'm glad I bought it! Came very quickly! You will take about 30 minutes more or less to assemble the whole thing. But it is very easy to put together, everything came as expected. I needed a wardrobe for my room since I don't have a closet and this is perfect! Great to hang clothes, also has lots of space to put shoes, handbags or jeans, hats etc. Love the choice of zipping it up to make it look neat or able to keep it open and accessible. Overall I'm very pleased with it better than I expected, definitely recommended this one (:
customer_reviews.author: Salma F.

customer_reviews.title: Careful the plastic is fragile
customer_reviews.text: I bought this and immediately the bottom corner Peg that helps it stand broke. I cannot find a way To replace the one so this entire set up is useless to me because one piece is broken from when I first got it... Anyone know how I can get a replacement so I can actually build this?
customer_reviews.author: Butt hose man

customer_reviews.title: it's nice and it's easy to install
customer_reviews.text: My honest review about this closet, it's nice and it's easy to install,,, specially when you had a house that the closet it was so small, i'm happy that I decided to buy this,,,
customer_reviews.author: M D

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed, arrived with missing parts & return label :(
customer_reviews.text: Ordered it couple days ago and it arrived today.. we were so excited about it since we’ve read awesome reviews.. but when we open the box and try to assemble, they have forgotten to put some parts so we couldnt do anything and no return label in the box too :( Very incovenient for us.. also, replacement is not an option so they had to refund the money and “recommended” to reorder again which is really inconvenient and disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Regine Cristobal

customer_reviews.title: Great and can’t beat the price
customer_reviews.text: Moved into a room in my house that doesn’t have a closet so I originally bought an expensive wood closet from another place and it was broken when it came so I decided to try this one and for the price (1/10 of what I paid for the first closet) it’s so much nicer than I thought it would be. Easy to put together, sturdy, and a lot of room! I actually love it and it looks nice. Exceeded my expectations!! Would highly recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: anthony licari

customer_reviews.title: HORRIBLE DIRECTIONS
customer_reviews.text: I almost never write reviews, so when I take the time, you know that the product was either life-changing, or a god-awful. In this case, we are going with god-awful. No real directions given, just a diagram with arrows, which I found to be incorrect. Some of the listed parts weren't even listed on the diagram. All of the connectors that attached to the poles came in one bag and weren't labeled. Had to start over several times. The legs of this product are really cheap plastic, and the poles are cheap too. I am keeping in for now bc I am desperate for closet space, but I would bet this thing is destroyed within a year.
customer_reviews.author: Mariana Padilla

customer_reviews.title: NIGHTMARE ASSEMBLY
customer_reviews.text: I would like to consider myself pretty smart. This contraption made me feel stupid! I had a million pieces on the bed and I stood and stared absolutely confused. It’s cheap feeling and if you like a million random pieces have at it
customer_reviews.author: Krystal

customer_reviews.title: Solved my storage problems!
customer_reviews.text: I was able to assemble it by myself, but you have to be careful when you put the connecters on they are facing the right direction. It wasn't difficult and the directions were easy to read. This works great and fits everything I needed it to! It looks just as shown, the fabric is strong enough to handle moving but I wouldn't say it's impossible to rip. To be clear I haven't had any issues with my fabric and the zippers work easily.
customer_reviews.author: Chanel Walker

customer_reviews.title: Warning - Defective
customer_reviews.text: I was very disappointed with this product. Four of the long poles in the center were a few inches short so both the shelved portions of the unit curve downward. Because of these defective poles the whole wardrobe doesn't fit together right. I looked over the directions multiple times to ensure that I put the right pieces in the right places. I did, and there is no alternate configuration of the supplied parts that would have worked. I feel like this would be a great product if not for this huge oversight. I would not recommend buying this product.
customer_reviews.author: Beth

customer_reviews.title: You will need to figure the assembly out by yourself. Parts are not all labeled.
customer_reviews.text: The pieces for assembly were not all marked. I had to spend considerable time using my own system of labeling the parts to assemble them correctly. I used YouTube and the rough diagram in the instructions to complete the project. If the pieces were properly labeled, it would have taken half the time. If you’re not determined or logical, send this back. But I am pleased with what I was able to do. And based on that, I will keep this. It meets my needs. It’s not terribly sturdy, but it is adequate.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Great Wardrobe for a Teenager
customer_reviews.text: What I Like: Holds a lot of clothing, a lot of space, reasonably easy to assemble (about 1 hour for a 14 yr old, no tools needed), zippable screens are nice to hide everything, keeps cloths clean and tidy, baskets fit nicely on shelves and under areas for hangers, can store some light items on top Things to Know: Shelves probably cannot hold that much weight, they are thin weave fabric, need to be careful in assembly not to break plastic connectors
customer_reviews.author: Nicole T.

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price. Looks clean when it’s set up.
customer_reviews.text: Over good for the price. Don’t expect a storage unit. I like how it looks without the cover. Take time and look at the plastics pieces and black rods before you put anything together. If you can, pre-label which bag carries what piece with a marker or sharpie. You will save time with that because the instructions kind of suck. Took all of 50min to set up. I like the space it saves. It’s not the most sturdiest of closets but again, you get what you pay for. Don’t clobber it with heavy boxes or bulky stuff cause then your asking for trouble. It’s works well for my needs. 🙂
customer_reviews.author: Aarongrand

customer_reviews.title: Waste of time and money. They didn't want to refund my money and wanted me to take pictures.m
customer_reviews.text: Total trash! The instructions are so small and insufficient. The parts they sent didn't match up and the poles were more like flat pieces of metal that I had to close so they'd fit into the plastic connectors.
customer_reviews.author: Gabrielleup10

customer_reviews.title: You dont have the follow the directions exactly as written. (A VERY GOOD THING)
customer_reviews.text: this is basically modular, in a sense anyway. you get extra pieces and can put it together in many different ways, (as far as where you want your shelves, or even "walls" if you choose to make them vertical. when zipped up stops my cats' hair from getting on my clothes. no complaints here, happy customer. I would like the option of buying a supplemental pack that would include extra rods and fabric to make more "walls" and such, but not a complaint.
customer_reviews.author: Richard p

customer_reviews.title: Not Sturdy, not very movable.
customer_reviews.text: Okay, couple of things, its a great buy for the coin, but the instructions are poorly labeled and don't do a good job of making certain things clear. Also, one of the clear plastic pieces cracked during assembly, fortunately they sent a spare. Also, the ties aren't going to keep it looking square unless zipped shut. The "metal" piping is flimsy as Hell and if you have to move the thing it starts coming apart. It doesn't stay together well under normal use either. At the end of the day, it's an alright product, but I find myself wishing I had bought lumber and or real pipe and built one my damn self.
customer_reviews.author: Ariyana Dumon

customer_reviews.title: To assemble pay close attention to directions because it is easy to confuse parts & it never fails you will ...
customer_reviews.text: This item is exactly what I needed. When I recently moved I needed more storage space. To assemble pay close attention to directions because it is easy to confuse parts & it never fails you will have to start back from the beginning. My advice keep parts in the plastic storage which are alphabetically labeled and you will not get the parts confused like i did. Once completely assembled you will have multiple horizontal and vertical storage shelves. I ended up buying storage totes for this portable closet to better keep clothes organized.
customer_reviews.author: J Hastings

customer_reviews.title: LOVE LOVE LOVE
customer_reviews.text: I've never been so excited about storage. I absolutely LOVE this. It is in my basement storing all of our seldom-used clothes and linens. It can handle a good bit of weight. We have all of our winter jackets (probably 5-6) hanging along with some other lighter items (dresses, etc). I love that this has shelves and hanging and zips closed. Some spoke about trouble putting the cover on. I suggest you open all the zippers and roll up the flaps, makes it SO MUCH easier! Assembly overall was easy as long as you follow the instructions. It was confusing and overwhelming at first, but the instructions are clear and the pcs are marked clearly. Seriously, LOVE this thing!
customer_reviews.author: Courtney Kolb

customer_reviews.title: good buy for light items
customer_reviews.text: it was really easy to put together and looks just like the picture. the material the shelfs are made out of are like plastic and tear very easily. about 10 years ago i had a similar portable closet but it was made out of the same fabric that the cover is made out of. theres 2 bars to hang items. each are aprox. 18in long. it seems okay as long as you only use it to store very light items. also product when assembled is very large.
customer_reviews.author: jessica

customer_reviews.title: Definitely gets the job done but it does look cheap material.
customer_reviews.text: It is easy to assemble, the labels could stand out more to help. Took maybe 30 to 40 minutes to put together. It does look cheap, but I'm glad I got it with the cover to hide it. It does have enough storage. I put all my dresses in it. I've only had it for a few days, so I'm not sure on how well it'll hold up and for how long. But I needed more space for clothes in my small room with not much closet space, and this definitely helped. A lot more spacious than I thought it would, so its a plus.
customer_reviews.author: Dominique Mustoe

customer_reviews.title: Great for the money
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble. Took about half an hour. Perfect for my sons room. Easy for him to see his clothes compared to using dressers or bureaus. As far as sturdiness, it actually isn't so bad considering you don't shake it around. For the money, you can't go wrong. I actually bought 4 of these too!
customer_reviews.author: i lin

customer_reviews.title: Clothing Closet Awesome for storage and just awesome all around!
customer_reviews.text: This is a really great thing to use if you just need some space for your things if you don't have a closet or even if you are in the middle of moving and just have nowhere to put your clothing. The only thing with this clothes closet is that putting it together takes some patience and just a little time, but doesn't require any tools, and pretty self-explanatory with the directions and then you start to get it after the first few stacks. Paired with buying some storage cloth bins, it's the perfect clothes closet and also to keep you little things like perfumes, hair stuff, accessories, etc... This thing is really sturdy and just great all around!
customer_reviews.author: KD

customer_reviews.title: Not Sturdy Enough
customer_reviews.text: Plastic corner pieces aren’t labeled so be sure to do that before hand on your own before assembling to save time. It looks awesome and exactly like photos. It just seems to be shifting because I think my things are too heavy for it, hoping it doesn’t end up colapsing. I also wish that red stitching wasn’t used on the inside, it bothers me.
customer_reviews.author: Alexis

customer_reviews.title: Cheap! DONT WAIST YOUR MONEY!!!
customer_reviews.text: This product would be great if outside cover wasn’t so cheap & flimsy!! This ripped upon installation! Also the bottom is open which encourages my cats to go inside! My initial review is, I love how much space I have but HATE the cover material and open bottom. Update: 3-4 months in....this closet has fallen apart and collapsed. It wasn’t stuffed or entirely full. Just cheap. I wish i could get a refund for this as I spent a good amount of money on it and can no longer use it :(
customer_reviews.author: Feline

customer_reviews.title: Space Saver!!
customer_reviews.text: This closet has helped me save a substantial amount of space in my drawers I’m not too sure about how much weight it can hold but it’s been holding up pretty well For those that had it fall apart on them, you NEED to make sure all parts are secured CORRECTLY and also don’t put your entire wardrobe in it I hang my jackets and dress shirts I don’t want wrinkled I put my jeans, dress pants, skullies and work gloves in the compartments At the bottom I folded my summer clothes to keep them out of the way Would definitely recommend this closet
customer_reviews.author: Tone

customer_reviews.title: Great at first but in time it does fall apart
customer_reviews.text: Great at first but in time it does fall apart. When hanging things on the bars, if you have any kind of weight on the shelves directly above it will be a pain in the butt. needs more space in between. Spoke with Customer Service and they gave some tips for improvement. They also liked my feedback. For great customer service I am raising one star.
customer_reviews.author: Harry Jameson

customer_reviews.title: Be careful disassembling it!
customer_reviews.text: We purchased it to use in a temporary guest room area where we would use it when needed and put away when not in use. Great to use the first time, but if you have to disassemble it, be careful in taking off the plastic elbows that connect the bars. They break off very easily. Also, be sure to SAVE your instructions yo assemble again! There are many different sizes that go in different places. Otherwise you’ll be having fin playing a nice puzzle figuring it out.
customer_reviews.author: Diana M. Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Decent Buy
customer_reviews.text: Took a while yo set up since the parts werent labled, but it was easy after you get the hang of if it. The cover is ok, could be better, and the materials are sufficiently sturdy for basic clothing items. The design is nice and simple, for compact storage. Decent buy.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Barbagallo

customer_reviews.title: Disappointment
customer_reviews.text: I am too embarrassed to show a photo of this terrible item. I am thoroughly disappointed in this and will be returning it. I put it together last night by myself and the instructions were not very helpful at all. It's not very sturdy. I really need a sturdy wardrobe for my kid's room. This had good reviews but sadly I didn't have a positive experience at all.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy W.

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Wardrobe for Extra Space
customer_reviews.text: This thing is amazing. I recently bought an older house that has very little closet space. Not only was this easy to put together, it looks very nice (I've gotten compliments on it), and it holds a TON of stuff! Right now I have all of my long-sleeved shirts and sweaters, pants, leggings, undershirts, scarves, gloves, and hats in it, and it's not even full. I still have extra space for more stuff that I will inevitably buy. I really could not be more pleased, as it solved a problem and looks good doing it.
customer_reviews.author: M. O'Connor

customer_reviews.title: Roomy and quality product.
customer_reviews.text: Pleasantly surprised at the capacity and quality of this closet. Took me close to 2 hrs to put together, but was easy with no tools needed. Material cover is thick and zippers are durable. Bottom if cover has ties in all 4 corners to hold in place. "I paid full price for this product so not bias." I am looking to purchase more products from this brand.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love love love
customer_reviews.text: Love love love! It holds everything I need (including my cat at the bottom!) Was worried for the amount I wanted to put in, but its been a week and this is holding strong.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Williams

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service and awesome product.
customer_reviews.text: This product was exactly as described, very sturdy and easy enough to assemble. When I got initial package I was missing two bags of one part and had double of another part. I contacted customer service through Amazon and was given a super fast response AND a replacement package within a couple days. Very satisfied with the product and customer service.
customer_reviews.author: MagenMoreno

customer_reviews.title: Must have !!!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this portable clothes storage. It was easy to assemble and Im not good with anything together. It took about 30 minutes. I recommend it if need extra space to hang clothes etc. It is sturdy I have my purses and clothes. It is a nice size
customer_reviews.author: Hi

customer_reviews.title: I love it! Will be buying another!
customer_reviews.text: I turned my walk in closet into a room for my daughter. The closet was way too big for me anyway so I bought this to go into my room and it's a lot bigger than I expected. It's perfect for anyone in a small space or just need the extra closet for lots of clothes. I screwed brackets into the wall over the back poles to make sure it doesn't fall over and it stays sturdy. Really nice product for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Melanin Infused Beauty Nails

customer_reviews.title: Ehh
customer_reviews.text: Not sure if I would recommend this one. This product is really just, okay. It doesn't seem like it's very sturdy. I just finished putting it together and two of the plastic connectors broke. Luckily there were two extra pieces. I suppose it gets the job done if you need extra space, but I'm sure there are some better finds on here.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just right for me
customer_reviews.text: This is just what I needed, it's fit my clothes and have space left, I just need more space for hanging my clothes
customer_reviews.author: Elijah

customer_reviews.title: This closet was a few dollars more but the quality is FAR superior. To build them you need to do a ...
customer_reviews.text: I ended up buying two different portable closets and I don't know why. But my mistake will be your benefit. This closet was a few dollars more but the quality is FAR superior. To build them you need to do a few things first. Separate the poles into sizes and then separate the connectors into styles. Look at the instructions and make sure that you have the holes facing up when you need to build a new level. This is a much better quality product than the other one I got. Don't pound the poles tight till it is all built then tap with something with a little weight. Enjoy.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Palmer

customer_reviews.title: Functional and easy
customer_reviews.text: This has solved a big storage problem very inexpensively. It was easy to put together and has clean lines. Looks good. The two hanger bars were not stable-kept popping loose, so I duct-taped them in place and they're fine now. Pretty pleased.
customer_reviews.author: laurie dunn

customer_reviews.title: I'm glad I bought this
customer_reviews.text: I'm glad I bought this! I can fit almost all my dresses, shirts, pants, scarves, sweaters AND shoes. Now, it does take quite a while to put together, but it's worth it. Make sure you have an hour or at the very most, two.
customer_reviews.author: MCReads

customer_reviews.title: Assembly would of went quicker if I read the directions!
customer_reviews.text: I am impatient when it comes to reading instructions but it all came out really nice after I decided to read them . Seems very sturdy and well made. Lots of storage. You will like this one!
customer_reviews.author: Lori T. Wise

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it!
customer_reviews.text: Haha. Not sturdy at all!!! Wasnt easy to put together and. Clothes kept falling bc the bars would pop out or break... Was aggravating!!
customer_reviews.author: ciji11

customer_reviews.title: Missing parts and super $hit instructions
customer_reviews.text: Come with missing parts. There are not enough components to assemble. The "instructions" are useless and it is even more "intuitive" to just show the pic without labeling incorrect parts. And it comes with parts that are completely unrelated to this product. Total waste of time.
customer_reviews.author: Mark He

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for sports gear!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to store my son’s Goalie gear in between use. It did come in a ton of pieces but since I have a lego expert in the house it took about 20-25 minutes. It works perfectly and allows air to circulate enough for everything to dry. Love that I can close it up and it looks nice and neat. I have purchased several charcoal odor packs and placed them throughout the closet and have tucked in some dryer sheets as well. Wish I had bought this years ago.
customer_reviews.author: Greg R.

customer_reviews.title: Good enough for temporary closet
customer_reviews.text: It was easy enough to assemble. Little hard to get hangers in and out due to little clearance between the bar and top shelves, especially with things in the shelves. Some of my long dresses drag but perfect for pants , skirts and tops
customer_reviews.author: tlmadrid777

customer_reviews.title: Very flimsy yet bulky
customer_reviews.text: This was kind of a pain to assemble. SO much PVC and plastic joints, it’s really easy to mess parts up and have to start over. It did serve its purpose as far as being able to hang and stack clothes, but it was very big and bulky and often came apart at the slightest bump.
customer_reviews.author: Smberendse

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Assemble and Looks Great
customer_reviews.text: There are a lot of parts to put together but instructions were pretty straight forward. Had to take apart one piece when realized that had put it on backwards, but since it’s plastic it was simple to do so. Love the way it looks, it is sturdy and looks great.
customer_reviews.author: Dolores Sanchez

customer_reviews.title: I live in a living room
customer_reviews.text: The instructions could have been a bit dumbed down for me. But once I got her up she is great. So much space. It's great for those of us that dont have that built in wall closet. Great! Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: customer

customer_reviews.title: So far so good!
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. I’ve had this for a few days and it is spacious. The directions were easy to follow. It’s all pictures and no words. The packages are labeled so you’re able to piece it together sanely. Just make sure to pay attention. I put incorrect pieces in twice but noticed and it was an easy fix. It’s doing it’s job so far and I’m happy for price.
customer_reviews.author: Krystal

customer_reviews.title: Great additional storage!
customer_reviews.text: This product is great. Lots of people are saying it falls apart easily but it’s not meant for lots of weight. If you want to put tons on here you’re better off finding something sturdier. It works great for a little additional storage when your closet is packed! I love it. Also prefer without the cover. Great product and and easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: Need 2 replacement covers and a few poles. Can’t get in touch with seller.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 4 of these closets to store off season clothes. To assemble was easy however 2/4 came damaged. I reached out to seller for replacement. No one answered the phone and the voicemail box is full. I sent an email waiting reply. I need 2 replacement covers and a few rods are bent. I doesn’t about 1.5 hrs installing and alternating the closet they are very customizable just need the replacement parts
customer_reviews.author: Eric M

customer_reviews.title: It’s great!
customer_reviews.text: It’s great! It’s sturdy, it was easy to assemble (i did it myself & it took me about an hour) & it has plenty of space. I would purchase another one once i fill this one out. PS I’m a photographer & i use this for my client wardrobe & props.
customer_reviews.author: Monika Ilieva

customer_reviews.title: Great value for you money
customer_reviews.text: It's portable, sturdy and has a great storage capacity. It's pretty easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: Erick Ramses Jimenez Rodriguez BM-83699

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE IT! Easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: I needed additional storage space for seasonal clothing. I decided to give this a try. I LOVE IT! Easy to put together. Holds a ton of clothing, boots, sweaters, jackets, dresses. Very sturdy piece and nice looking! Mine is in the garage. I live in AZ and have to change out clothing twice a year. This is perfect!
customer_reviews.author: C. Nagel

customer_reviews.title: VERY POOR QUALITY
customer_reviews.text: Although this looks nice, DO YOUR HOMEWORK and spend a little more to get a better quality unit. The frame is so flimsy, I'm afraid to put any weight on it. Were trying to return it now after not even finishing putting it together.
customer_reviews.author: Vince B.

customer_reviews.title: Exceeded expectations!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome storage closet! This closet definitely exceeded my expectations, it has a ton of space, looks neat and was easy to assemble. The ONE only con that I’ll briefly mention is it’s sturdiness. It sometimes gets wobbly when hanging things up/taking things out BUT that’s only because it’s held together by metal bars (that you can’t see from the outside), and I think I may have a little too much stuffed inside haha. Overall, worth the price, you won’t regret it!
customer_reviews.author: Sonya

customer_reviews.title: What a useful product!
customer_reviews.text: Everything comes labled in putting together this clothes closet. The booklet included, gives you a checklist of parts and instructions for assembly. Laying out all the pieces makes assembly easier. Take your time when placing the cover to avoid rips. Be patient with yourself because it's really a nice and useful product.
customer_reviews.author: Annie's Corner

customer_reviews.title: Not completely closed off
customer_reviews.text: The bottom of the closet is open to the floor. It has 1/2" to 1" gaps between the connectors on the lowest level, closest to the ground. This would not keep bugs, moths, etc out. The picture that shows the water sitting on the fabric, that is not the outside cover, that is the shelving material. The cover is clean and very thin, almost see-through.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Good bang for your buck
customer_reviews.text: Construction was smooth and it looks good. Works great as a temp closet but doesn’t seem like it would stand the test of time if it was used for an extended period of time.
customer_reviews.author: Calypso

customer_reviews.title: Great for hunters
customer_reviews.text: I use this as my OZone closet. way better than spending 200+ dollars when this works exactly the same.
customer_reviews.author: Brandin Swaney

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Bought 2 after reading tons of reviews on this and comparing it to others. They are sturdy and look great. I rigged up the zippered door flaps a little different than pictured (so they roll up and stay on inside) so that they couldn’t be seen from the outside. Bought some matching baskets for the center row for nearer storage. Couldn’t be happier
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Storage
customer_reviews.text: My 17 year old and I just put this together this evening and I love it. Plenty of space for my clothing and shoes. It was not that difficult to put together and we made sure all pieces were securely placed. It’s actually a little bigger than I expected but that’s not a problem either.
customer_reviews.author: Kristine

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price!
customer_reviews.text: This is just what I needed for all my darn costumes!! It's honestly perfect for the price point!!
customer_reviews.author: May Hemmer

customer_reviews.title: Helped us create a new bedroom in the basement for cheap
customer_reviews.text: Moved high school son to the basement to allow him to spread out a little. Absolutely loves it! He doesn't have to share a room and his things are still all nearby without buying a bunch of permanent furniture that we won't need in a few years. Well maybe! :)
customer_reviews.author: Collin

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: I used this for storage and it works good ! It was easy to assemble i love how light it is to move around if needed.
customer_reviews.author: Verushka

customer_reviews.title: Great wardrobe
customer_reviews.text: Pretty nice, sturdy wardrobe. Suits it's purpose for quick setup for a room with no closet. Took a while to put together, but mostly because connector pieces are not labeled.
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughter when we moved into our house. It’s an old house and her bedroom didn’t have a closet in it. I got tired of trying to shove everything in her dresser so I ended up finding this. For the price it’s perfect! Really glad I got it!
customer_reviews.author: Mama.Santi

customer_reviews.title: Wobbly
customer_reviews.text: Not sturdy at all. Move one thing and the whole structure shakes like it's about to come down.
customer_reviews.author: Jess Young

customer_reviews.title: very very nice portable shelf/closet
customer_reviews.text: very very nice product.. strong and durable with plenty of space and shelf's just as advertised.. all the parts were in the package and it was easy to assemble... light weight and easy to move around but strong.. so far so good if something goes wrong ill be back here to let you know... but right now its perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Assembly was easy, if you looking for basic closet storage this can be the one for you.
customer_reviews.text: I like the material, I think the cloth shelves should have been thicker material so it can hold storage boxes. Overall it did meet my needs. The box shelves were purchased separately. Easy to assembly, instructions were cleared. It took me an 1 hour to assemble because I take my time to make sure everything connects correctly.
customer_reviews.author: Fernando Regino

customer_reviews.title: Had to return it. It was very poorly made ...
customer_reviews.text: Had to return it. It was very poorly made and my brother who is an engineer had trouble putting it together.
customer_reviews.author: Witchdoctor131

customer_reviews.title: Looks Great, Just Follow the Instructions!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is massive, I have so much stuff stored in it that its ridiculous. The shelves, while fabric, are solid and doing their job. The ability to hang things separately is nice as well. Assembly can be daunting due to the insane amount of poles and plastic connectors in this kit, but if you are good with following instructions then don't hesitate to buy as this will do everything you need it to!
customer_reviews.author: Heliman

customer_reviews.title: Good for Infant/Toddler Clothes
customer_reviews.text: Nice look and size. Not sturdy enough or spacious enough to hold much more than infant/toddler clothes. Different parts of the assembly did not fit securely including one of the bars that was designed to hang the clothes on.
customer_reviews.author: Cuddles

customer_reviews.title: Works great for the money!
customer_reviews.text: Joining households and need more room! This unit is now in my garage. I have anchored it to the wood studs with PVC plastic brackets around the steel poles. Have even added an 18"d shelf 6' long above this unit partially supported by the unit for overhead storage. Must be patient putting all the pieces together, but for someone who relies heavily on reviews, I felt I needed to give my opinion on this product.
customer_reviews.author: JAMES RICHARD RICE JR

customer_reviews.title: Excellent, Sturdy, Easy to Assemble.
customer_reviews.text: These are excellent for the price. Easy to assemble. Light yet sturdy. Highly recommend them if you do not have closets or need additional closet space. Added plus is dealing with SONGMICS has been an absolute pleasure, there were missing parts and they sent them out immediately. A+ Seller.
customer_reviews.author: MusicInspiresMe

customer_reviews.title: Good closet
customer_reviews.text: The space is very nice and it was easy to assemble I love the cover , it could be alittle more sturdy but you cant expect much form poles and plastic joints. Be careful when moving it around the poles may come detached alittle. Make sure you really push them in and bang everything down when its fully together as well. Good closet!
customer_reviews.author: Kristin flaxcomb

customer_reviews.title: VERY CHEAP
customer_reviews.text: After having it for a few months, the whole thing started to lean and looked like it was going to collapse. I had to lean it against the wall and even then it would lean forward. DO NOT BUY.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle Adams

customer_reviews.title: Works well but poor assembly instructions
customer_reviews.text: Great item, works great and fits my whole seasonal wardrobe. Not difficult to assemble but instructions were terrible: not clear, only a diagram (no narrative or pics) and everything in metric system. Fine for me because I happen to own a metric tape measure but who else does...
customer_reviews.author: Tatsiana

customer_reviews.title: What an amazing option
customer_reviews.text: It is a great option for permanent or temporary storage purposes to allow for arranging a wardrobe without having to buy heavy furniture. I bought two of them to organize additional garments while we had visitors at home.
customer_reviews.author: Meister

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy but tedious assembly
customer_reviews.text: Assembly doesn’t take forever, but it is tedious. The clear joint pieces don’t have labeling on the package saying what they are and that would have been nice considering the black bar pieces did. Once assembled it is sturdy and holds quite a bit. There was a spot on the front of my cover that was maybe dirt or glue. It did come off, but it wasn’t pleasant to find on the product.
customer_reviews.author: SC

customer_reviews.title: Not fully enclosed. Open at bottom.
customer_reviews.text: The openings at the bottom are not small and made the unit unusable for my attic storage purpose. If you are using it somewhere without concern of bugs or other critters it may be a good option. Tubing and connectors are descent, but I wouldn’t call them robust.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan Peck

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the assembly hassle
customer_reviews.text: I would have had to have paid someone to assemble this. The instructions were useless. I sent it back.
customer_reviews.author: STORMY LEE

customer_reviews.title: Good size
customer_reviews.text: This Product come damage.. two of the bottom pieces are damage and broken.. I want the seller to replace this exact pieces. I don’t want to return after put together for more than an hour
customer_reviews.author: Angelica Acosta

customer_reviews.title: Trash
customer_reviews.text: This product lasted not even two months. One day I opened my closet and the center rods had caved in and the cheap plastic connectors were bent and they won’t reattach. DO NOT BUY THIS PRODUCT.
customer_reviews.author: Shea Renner

customer_reviews.title: My mom loves it!!
customer_reviews.text: We loved this product! It took an hour and 30 mins alone but overall it was not bad!! Totally recommend and durable!!
customer_reviews.author: Yvette Snow

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Perfect! Easy to set up and assemble by yourself. .. Cloth is cheap value. But it gets the job done. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Heise

customer_reviews.title: Great!!
customer_reviews.text: Best purchase I could make! Bought another and returned due to it not being sturdy
customer_reviews.author: Casandria Parker

customer_reviews.title: Beyond expectations
customer_reviews.text: This closet is incredible!!! Even though the reviews were already great I expected this item to disappoint in SOME small way. I was wrong. Easy to assemble, sturdy, and has a high capacity to hold clothes. I have more space than I need!
customer_reviews.author: D

customer_reviews.title: Great for storage of clothing!
customer_reviews.text: This was a great investment! We got this because our office/closet room is now becoming a nursery so we needed additional space. My fiancé is 6’2” and I’m pretty small. Our clothes fit lovely. This isn’t something we plan to use as a closet, but more for storage of clothing. I am not sure that it’s durable enough to stand clothes and hangers going in and out.
customer_reviews.author: Angelica

customer_reviews.title: Great space for clothing if you don’t have closet space.
customer_reviews.text: Recently just got married and my wife needed somewhere to put her dresses. This is perfect. It has shelving too for some more of her clothes and space at the bottom to put extra items.
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: Served its purpose
customer_reviews.text: Not fun to put together and you have to be careful because the plastic pieces that link it together break so easy. Nice size and served its purpose tho. I do however wish the material was a bit thicker.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Its 100% amazing
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to put together..the outer cover does fit a bit snug but not difficult to put on at all..its very sturdy and definitely a must have no closet and want something thatll work to hang and store ur clothes or items..and the dust cover makes it that much more perfect!!
customer_reviews.author: Emma c.

customer_reviews.title: decent, great for the price
customer_reviews.text: difficult to put together, I broke half the pieces wish it came with extras, i do like that it zips up all the way to keep the pets out, hold all my clothes no problem would buy again, but dont plan on ever taking it down
customer_reviews.author: Rachael

customer_reviews.title: Good of you are looking for space.
customer_reviews.text: I liked this closet. It took some time to put together, but it is sturdy and holds a good amount. A good purchase I think.
customer_reviews.author: Mom of 3

customer_reviews.title: Strong
customer_reviews.text: It is really sturdy and can hold alot of stuff
customer_reviews.author: Dominque Harris

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Build
customer_reviews.text: I liked this product. It was pretty easy to assemble, just make sure you keep up with the rods. The sizes are different and its easy to get confused. While the overall structure is simple and sturdy, keep the item you place on the shelves very light. Like clothing only.
customer_reviews.author: Qubieinique Greer

customer_reviews.title: Attractive and neat
customer_reviews.text: Love this closet Very sturdy and attractive . Neat .. Could do with more hanging clothes space and less storage though .
customer_reviews.author: milly C

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: The ideal size for my wife! She uses one side for casual tops to hang and the other side for dressy tops to hang and the shelves for her Jeans, sweaters, and bins to put socks and pjs. theres even extra space for her bags at the bottom!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Dumandan

customer_reviews.title: Great product / Bad assembly directions
customer_reviews.text: The directors were a joke. But we used our brain and you tubed it. Once we got it up it was great. My son has an attic bedroom with no closet so it did the trick. I would buy another one (now that I know how to put it together)
customer_reviews.author: Liz

product_meta.title: SONGMICS Portable Clothes Closet, Non-Woven Fabric Wardrobe with 2 Hanging Rods, 9 Storage Shelves, Storage Organizer, Black URYG12H
feature_bullets: EVERYTHING HAS ITS PLACE: 2 hanging rods for daily outfits, 9 storage shelves for bags, hats, underwear, and socks—this non-woven fabric wardrobe offers a spacious home for all
STRENGTH ISN’T LOST: Crafted with thick metal tubes and strengthened plastic connectors, this storage organizer will offer firm support for your beautiful clothes from season to season

AWAY FROM DUST: Your favorite new garment needs better protection. The fabric cover, equipped with a zipper and hook-and-loop fasteners, was handpicked to store your clothes properly. This clothes rack has you covered!

WORRY-FREE ASSEMBLY: No need to be a DIY expert, and no tools are required. Just follow the illustrated, detailed instructions and numbered parts, and you’ll get your new closet ready to display your beautiful clothes before you know it
WHAT YOU GET: A non-woven wardrobe with hanging bars and practical shelves that gives you plenty of storage to solve the chaos, and a useful, refreshing addition to your bedroom or walk-in closet

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars1,857 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
specifications.Included Components: SONGMICS Portable Clothes Closet Non-woven Fabric Wardrobe Double Rod Storage Organizer Black 59-Inch URYG12H
